title: Welltower Made All-Cash Offer for Healthcare Realty Trust
sub_head: Healthcare-focused REIT made nearly $5 billion all-cash bid shortly after Healthcare Realty agreed to merge with rival earlier this year
body:
Welltower Inc., the big healthcare-focused real-estate investment trust, made a nearly $5 billion all-cash bid for Healthcare Realty Trust Inc. shortly after the smaller REIT agreed to merge with a rival earlier this year, according to people familiar with the matter.
Welltower remains interested after its bid was rejected and plans to say as much to Healthcare Realty this week, the people said.
